sentences.sContent: The inherent intangibility of service determines that the licensee of service marks cannot directly indicate his name and address on the service he offers.
sentences.sContent_eng: The inherent intangibility of service determines that the licensee of service marks cannot directly indicate his name and address on the service he offers.
sentences.sCn: 尽管服务所具有的无形特性，使得服务商标被许可使用人无法直接在其提供的服务上标明其名称及地址。

words.tran: 得到许可的；领有执照的
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: someone who has official permission to do something
